title: 客户端不明原因崩溃但服务器正常
author: 神奇镜子君
txt_content:
本帖最后由 神奇镜子君 于 2020-4-12 18:14 编辑 

不知道为什么客户端会崩溃，貌似是加载到某些东西后崩溃，传送后和到某个人的家里时会发生崩溃。请问该怎么做？
崩溃报告：

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  ForgelinPlugin ([前置]Forgelin-1.8.4.jar)
  MekanismCoremod ([通用机械]Mekanism-1.12.2-9.8.3.390.jar)
  JechCore ([JEI附属]JustEnoughCharacters-1.12.0-3.4.7.jar)
  PhosphorFMLLoadingPlugin ([照明优化]phosphor-1.12.2-0.2.6+build50-universal.jar)
  AnotherCommonBugFix ([通用bug修复]AnotherCommonBugFix-1.1.0-1.12.2.jar)
  CreativePatchingLoader ([前置]CreativeCore_v1.9.90_mc1.12.2.jar)
  CustomSkinLoader ([万用皮肤补丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.11.jar)
  CorePlugin ([平滑字体]SmoothFont-mc1.12.2-2.1.1.jar)
  CTMCorePlugin ([前置]CTM-MC1.12.2-1.0.1.30.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod ([R键整理]InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) ([泡沫优化]foamfix-0.10.10-1.12.2.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

replies.txt_content:

从堆栈得知这可能和区块或者实体有关
